overview:
Scott is an entrepreneur with a passion for travel. He received his degree from the University of the Pacificâ€™s School of International Studies with a BA in Global Economic Relations, focusing on cross cultural communication and international marketing. Scott loves spending his time exploring the world. Heâ€™s studied and worked abroad and has traveled to more than 20 countries, experiencing different cultures from isolated Himalayan monasteries to wine making, olive pressing Italian villas.

He’s currently working on a new project called TravelTipping, a site that helps people find the best discounts on travel deals around the world. Before TravelTipping, Scott was the marketing manager of all English speaking countries for Kizoa, a Paris based web 2.0 company. In this role, Scott led significant growth by nearly doubling conversion rates and increasing new user registration by 15x from an initial 100 users per day to 1,500, accelerating the European funded company past 1 million total users. Heâ€™s also worked for several years as an independent marketing consultant in the Silicon Valley.
